7. Sharing: Although identification of subjects from RNA sequencing data is not likely it is not impossible, therefore the European EGA may be a saver alternative to the American GEO for data sharing (ega-archive.org/). KU Leuven now also has its own data repository RDR (www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) that you can consider as alternative to Zenodo.
